/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is a hive of activity, with numerous cars and buses navigating the roads. The roads themselves are lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the roads, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive view. The image is bathed in the soft glow of daylight, casting long shadows and highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
